_header: O Lord omnipotent Father of our creation
_description: ‘Psalmi passionis domini’ — twenty-four stanzas rhyme royal with Latin lines of psalm between stanzas

CamTCC601.First Lines:
o Lord omnipotent fadyr of owre creacyounAll thyng producyng only
                    by volunteThy son transmysyng from hys habytacyounTendryst oure nature
                    with pure virgynyte…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…That mynde and dede be set the to honoureWith lastyng feyth
                    vnto my dedly howre
CamTCC601.Attributed Title:
Incipiunt Psalmi Passionis domini (f. 174v);
                        Expliciunt Psalmi Passionis Domini (f. 177v)
CamTCC601.Editions:
MacCracken,  Henry Noble. 
             “Lydgatiana.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         130 (1913): 286-311: 299.
